result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: This plan will describe what data the project will identify and generate and how the FAIR principles will be implemented in both data and by extension in tools by providing all the project outcomes under a Creative Commons Attribution 40 Licence and will explain how the project will be performed in an ethically sound manner The DMP will be updated to consider newly collected data and newly identified potential ways of use if applicable
